import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import bookService from "../services/book.services"; function BookNew(){ const [name,setName]=useState(""); const [description,setDescription]=useState(""); const [isbn,setIsbn]=useState(""); const [auteur,setAuteur]=useState(""); const [editeur,setEditeur]=useState(""); const [image,setImage]=useState(""); const [category,setCategory]=useState(""); const navigate=useNavigate(); async function submitBook(e){ e.preventDefault() const b = {"name":name,"description":description,"isbn":isbn,"auteur":auteur,"editeur":editeur,"image":image,"category":category} await bookService.addBook(b) navigate("/admin/books") } return(
) } export default BookNew
